def: to take a dog outside for exercise
ex: He walks the dog every evening.

def: to kick and pass a ball in a game
ex: We play soccer after school.

def: to have fun with swings or slides
ex: Children play in the playground.

def: to sleep and cook outside in nature
ex: We go camping in summer.

def: to move on a bicycle
ex: He rides his bike to school.

def: to go up a tree using hands and feet
ex: The boy climbs a tree easily.

def: to go walking for fun or exercise
ex: We take a walk after dinner.

def: to make a kite move in the sky
ex: They fly kites in the park.

def: to move on ice or wheels
ex: I skate in the winter.

def: to eat outdoors for fun
ex: We have a picnic in the park.

def: to hit a shuttlecock with rackets
ex: They play badminton together.

def: to visit stores to buy things
ex: Mom goes shopping on weekends.

def: to make shapes with sand
ex: Kids build sandcastles at the beach.

def: to catch fish using a rod
ex: He fishes at the lake on weekends.

def: to throw a ball into a hoop
ex: They play basketball after class.

def: to move fast with your legs outdoors
ex: He runs in the park every day.

def: to travel on a bus
ex: She rides a bus to the city.

def: to hit and catch a ball in a team sport
ex: We play baseball after lunch.

def: to capture images with a camera
ex: She takes pictures of flowers.

def: to move through water
ex: We go swimming in summer.
